title: Why do you refuse to provide new phones as warranty items? Why do you insist on broken refurbs?
content: For the third time you sent me a refurbished phone that broke within 2 months, and here you are sending me another refurb.  Why do you do this?  Why is Google incapable of doing the right thing and providing NEW devices under warranty?  If you were honest about this nonsense upfront, nobody would buy Pixels.
